Headline: Founder @ OneAnt - Save more when we buy together
Comment:
Avik Ashar, my experience with angel funding has been… mixed.
We had a mentor-investor who, with all good intentions, offered advice that ended up costing us dearly because they had zero context in the domain we were building in. But to be fair, it wasn’t just the investor advice that led to disaster. Founder bias played a huge role too, I wanted to believe the path was clear. And in that optimism, I didn’t question enough, didn’t challenge enough.
